profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2021-04-03 10:02:34 -0400.

repository.corpname: Digital Collections and Archives, Tufts University

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: This collection is open for research.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection is organized into one series.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: Thomas M. Hart, born June 14, 1946, graduated from Tufts with a B.S. in Biology in 1968. He took the photographs in this collection both while he was a student and after his graduation.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection contains photographs taken by Tufts student Tom Hart.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Some material in this collection may be protected by copyright and other rights. Please see "Reproductions and Use" on the Digital Collections and Archives website for more information about reproductions and permission to publish. No documentation is available regarding the intellectual property rights in this collection.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This series contains photographs by Tufts student Tom Hart. Includes snapshots of student gatherings and events.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: People and events may not be correctly identified.
